titles.title: We Wish You a Merry Christmas

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
We wish you a merry Christmas
We wish you a merry Christmas
We wish you a merry Christmas
And a happy New Year

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Good tidings we bring
To you and your kin
We wish you a merry Christmas
And a happy New Year

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Selamat hari Natal
Selamat hari Natal
Selamat hari Natal dan Tahun Baru

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Salam bagimu sekalian
Selamat hari Natal dan Tahun Baru
